snippet.title: Evermore Knights - Soft Launch Gameplay (Android/iOS)
snippet.description:
Evermore Knights - Soft Launch Gameplay (Android/iOS)

- Play for Free, and Play to Earn!
Clear quests and dungeons and daily activities to earn valuable Evergems!

- Strategic Turn-Based Gameplay!
Assemble a party of four and utilize the power of elemental reactions to obliterate your foes!

- Challenging Dungeons!
Face challenging enemies and collect rewards to power up your party members!

- Anime Inspired 2D Action!
Pull off fancy explosive attacks and unlock new unique and exclusive characters to your roster.

- Maximizing your characters with Gear and Rare Drops!
Upgrade your equipment with collectible gears and rare drops obtained from monsters and daily dungeons.

- Epic Journeys Await!
Explore the world of Temeris and meet a cast of fun and quirky characters each with their own unique storylines.

==========================
►► Total Size: 519MB

► Online/Offline: Online

► Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nomina.evermoreknights
► APK: https://apkcombo.com/evermore-knights/com.nomina.evermoreknights/

► IOS: Coming Soon
==========================
#GamingMobile

► Dragon TFT: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC36UGge3JFz2m9z07BWnefg/featured

► List Game:

⭕️ MMORPG Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgaU5Mr9rjFSdQK5UybzNt7wIPat5kzut

⭕️ RPG Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgaU5Mr9rjFTB0tMhtISzyBqpuutl9r7m

⭕️ MOBA Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgaU5Mr9rjFTnJNRPlrQjtmyBLRZ4dU53

⭕️ Top Game Mobile: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgaU5Mr9rjFQ45JbkmfmGLyC0ZE7-uG-F
